cause.description:
help da ppl not only in egypt,but across da world to get educated for a better civilsed world.Please make an effort and help
1. education is a universal right
2. education must be improved across da wrold
3. building free schools for ppl who are financily disable to help dem educate der kids
cause.mission: raise money for da ppl who are not financily to educate der children
cause.name: education in egypt
